channel.title: Softlayer_container_product_order_network_performancestorage on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in Softlayer_container_product_order_network_performancestorage on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Product_Order_Network_PerformanceStorage
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Product_Order_Network_PerformanceStorage Datatype Description This is the base data type for Performance storage order containers. If you wish to place an order you must not use this class and instead use the appropriate child container for the type of storage you would like to order: [[SoftLayer_Container_Product_Order_Network_PerformanceStorage_Nfs]] for File and [[SoftLayer_Container_Product_Order_Network_PerformanceStorage_Iscsi]] for Block storage. Local bigDataOrderFlag Flag for identifying an order for Big Data Deployment. Type: boolean
